subject: Beards and Mustaches
Baseball
lead_paragraph: After torn elbow ligaments sidelined Brian Wilson last year with the Giants, he has recovered enough to solidify the Dodgers’ bullpen with the same ruthless efficiency he had as a closer.
snippet: After torn elbow ligaments sidelined Brian Wilson last year with the Giants, he has recovered enough to solidify the Dodgers’ bullpen with the same ruthless efficiency he had as a closer.
